summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1585, for the improvement of Blewett Street, from Ashworth Avenue to the right of way of the Northern Pacific Railway Company, and Bagley Avenue, from the right of way of the Northern Pacific Railway to Kilbourne Street, all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks thereon, under Ordinance No. 16877 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
